title: Iterative Instructional Design Scenarios for Improving an Online Introductory Biology Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biological concepts and experience in curriculum management
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for learners in managerial/leadership roles to improve an online introductory biology course, enhancing STEM education efficiency for employees.

learning_goals: Learners improve the content organization efficiency of an online biology course by over 20% through three iterative refinements
Learners derive optimal learning activity design solutions by comparing experimental and control groups using A/B testing methods
Learners analyze modified course learning outcome metrics (completion rates, assessment scores) through project-based evaluations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
